intro: Pinguicula orchidioides, commonly known as the orchid-like butterwort, is a carnivorous plant native to the high-altitude regions of South America. Pinguicula orchidioides is a unique example of a carnivorous plant that combines specialized trapping mechanisms with ornamental floral features.
